description: A React functional component named ChatInput for capturing user messages and sending them via the onSend callback. Includes textarea for message input and a button to send the message.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Handles sending the message if the input is not empty and the component is enabled.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keydown events in the textarea, submitting message on Enter unless Shift is pressed.
